summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2236, for the improvement of Whitman Avenue, from North 59th Street to North 62nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 22907 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
